description: NEST. A thoughtfully designed enclave of 26 spacious townhomes in the heart of West Abbotsford, providing the ultimate access point to everything Abbotsford has to offer. With a mix of 3-bedroom + den with 2.5 bathrooms and 4-bedroom homes with 3.5 bathrooms, Nest caters to diverse family needs, ensuring there’s a perfect space for everyone. Featuring expansive living areas, high 9’ ceilings, designer finishes and expansive windows filling each home with natural light. The den serves as a perfect bedroom, home office or study area making work-from-home days as productive as they are comfortable. Phase 1 Pre-Sale.
